content:
<rule id="java-removals-00020" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="sun.reflect.CallerSensitive{*}">
                    <location>IMPORT</location>
                    <location>ANNOTATION</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="sun.reflect.CallerSensitive annotation was deprecated in Java 9">
                    <message>
                        `sun.reflect.CallerSensitive` annotation was deprecated in Java 9.
                        Refer to the example changeset linked below. 
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://hg.openjdk.java.net/openjfx/9-dev/rt/rev/70f6fa01a32c" title="Example changeset"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
